title: Ticket #5895: condor_q should display the current time in the banner
description: condor_q prints a banner before showing the jobs. We would like this banner to show the current time (as per the schedd), so that when condor_q output is saved for debugging and posterity, we always have a timestamp of when that output was valid.
check_ins: 2016-Sep-20 13:38   Check-in [49241]: have condor_q display the server time in the banner. #5895 ===VersionHistory:Complete=== (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
